00016 #define RFMSG_MAX_DATA_LENGTH 32   /* block1 : 10 + 2crc, block2: 16 + crc , 2 spare bytes */ 
00017 
00018 /* Flags for msg */
00019 #define RFMSG_AUTOFREE     (1<<0)  
00020 #define RFMSG_HI_PRIO      (1<<1)  
00023 #define COUNT_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(x) (sizeof(x)/sizeof(x[0]))
00024 
00026 enum erfmsg_state {
00027      RFMSG_FREE = 0x00,   
00028      RFMSG_ALLOC,         
00029      RFMSG_SENDING,       
00030      RFMSG_WAIT_ACK,      
00031      RFMSG_COMPLETE,      
00032 };
00033 
00034 struct rfmsg {
00035   struct rfmsg *next;                    
00036   enum erfmsg_state state;          
00037   uint8_t flags;                     
00038   uint8_t *handler;                  
00039   uint8_t len;                       
00040   uint8_t data[RFMSG_MAX_DATA_LENGTH];   
00041   uint8_t repeat;                      
00042 };
